title: Email Sender Actor Input with KV Store
description: Wrapper actor to send email using Apify's send-mail actor using a key-value store

kvStoreId.title: KV Store ID
kvStoreId.description: ID of the KV store containing email data. The KV store should have two keys: 'subject' and 'text' which are used as subject and text of the email respectively.

to.title: To
to.description: Email address of the recipient(s), you can comma-separate multiple addresses.

cc.title: Copy
cc.description: Email CC same format as to.

bcc.title: Blind copy
bcc.description: Email BCC same format as to.

replyTo.title: Reply to
replyTo.description: Email address which will be set when recipient will try to reply to mail. Uses header Reply-To see doc

isMock.title: Mock email
isMock.description: For test purposes - log process to console but not send the e-mail
